setting.name: VOICEMAIL_AGE_LIMIT
setting.label: VoiceMail expiration
setting.description: Number of days voice mail messages will be kept on the system.

setting.name: SMTP_SERVER
setting.label: SMTP server
setting.description: IP address or DNS name of SMTP server used for Voice Mail notification

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_GLOBAL_CALL_PICKUP_CODE
setting.label: Global call pickup code
setting.description: Code that needs to be dialed to to pick up a ringing call on any phone. Set to empty to disable global call pickup.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_DIRECTED_CALL_PICKUP_CODE
setting.label: Directed call pickup code
setting.description: Code that needs to be dialed to to pick up a ringing call on an a specific phone. To pick up extention 123 dial this code followed by 123.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_CALL_PICKUP_WAIT
setting.label: Call pickup timeout
setting.description: Number of seconds that the original call will ring after pickup code is dialed.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_CALL_RETRIEVE_CODE
setting.label: Call park retrieve code
setting.description: Code that needs to be dialed to retrieve parked call. Dial this code followed by call park extension to pick up parked call.
